meanings.definition: To edit or revise written material.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys enditing her stories to make them better.
meanings.sent2: I need to enditing my essay before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried enditing the dog's barking by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: His job is like enditing a puzzle, putting all the pieces together.
meanings.sent5: Enditing her drawings with different colors brings them to life.

meanings.definition: The act of editing or revising written material.
meanings.sent1: Enditing requires attention to detail and patience.
meanings.sent2: The enditing of the manuscript took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The enditing of the play turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: Her enditing of the report was like sculpting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The enditing process can be both challenging and rewarding.
